head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LA SALANDRA, FRANK

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LA SALANDRA, FRANK

block.p: La SALANDRA-Frank. On October 13, 2000, at age 64. Loving brother of Peter La Salandra, Jennie Zammetti, Catherine Galasso and Leonard La Salandra, and friend to John Antonelle. Also survived by 14 nieces and nephews, and 13 great-nieces and nephews. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave, at 81 St, Sunday, Monday and Tuesday, 1-5 and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial at Our Lady of Mt. Carmel Church, 447 E. 115th St, Wednesday, 10 AM. Interment to follow at St. Charles Cemetery.

La SALANDRA-Frank. On October 13, 2000, at age 64. Loving brother of Peter La Salandra, Jennie Zammetti, Catherine Galasso and Leonard La Salandra, and friend to John Antonelle. Also survived by 14 nieces and nephews, and 13 great-nieces and nephews. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave, at 81 St, Sunday, Monday and Tuesday, 1-5 and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial at Our Lady of Mt. Carmel Church, 447 E. 115th St, Wednesday, 10 AM. Interment to follow at St. Charles Cemetery.
